info.notes: This translation is based on the English.json file (default) and thus should have all the translation keys (as of January 11th, 2023). The role keys have been taken from the Italian translation. I am a native speaker from Switzerland and will use the typography rules I learned here. In order to stay coherent, this translation will only use the orthography of 1990's rectification. Pour des raisons de clart√©, seul le masculin est employ√©.
